description: Yo como desarrollador de apis y microservicios, negocio me solicita poder consultar,crear,modificar y eliminar los clientes del banco poder para su administracion en el banco

elements.name: Obtener la informaci贸n del cliente via el recurso  /clientes/v1

steps.name: I GET `host`/clientes/`versionApi`?idCliente=1000
response code should be 200
response body should be valid json
response body path $.id should be 1000
response body path $.nombre should be Yaridel
response body path $.apellidoPaterno should be Arzate
response body path $.apellidoMaterno should be Landa
response body path $.edad should be 25
response body path $.rfc should be CUPU800825569
response body path $.email should be yaridelal435@gmail.com
response body path $.direccion should be calle esperanza, 10 de abril, Temixco Morelos
response body path $.codigoPostal should be 62588
response body path $.referencias should be Frente a la base de camiones LOS PEPES
response body path $.genero should be F

elements.name: Obtener la informaci贸n del cliente via el recurso  /clientes/v1

steps.name: I GET `host`/clientes/`versionApi`?idCliente=5000
response code should be 200
response body should be valid json
response body path $.id should be 5000
response body path $.nombre should be Jovani
response body path $.apellidoPaterno should be Arzate
response body path $.apellidoMaterno should be Cabrera
response body path $.edad should be 28
response body path $.rfc should be 456787656453454sds
response body path $.email should be jovaniac@gmail.com
response body path $.direccion should be bugambilias 2, colonia 10 de abril, Temixco Morelos
response body path $.codigoPostal should be 0634560
response body path $.referencias should be enfrente de la tortilleria ALFONSOS
response body path $.genero should be M

elements.name: Obtener la informaci贸n del cliente pero validando cuando ingresamos mal los datos de consulta /clientes/versionApi

steps.name: I GET `host`/clientes/`versionApi`?idCliente=1000s
response code should be 400
response body should be valid json
response body path $.codigo should be 400.api-clientes.1000
response body path $.mensaje should be Los datos del cliente contienen caracteres invalidos
response body path $.informacion should be Debes introducir correctamente los datos
response body path $.tracking should be 98755343

elements.name: Caso donde validamos que un cliente no exista /clientes/versionApi

steps.name: I GET `host`/clientes/`versionApi`?idCliente=5001
response code should be 404
response body should be valid json
response body path $.codigo should be 404.api-clientes.1100
response body path $.mensaje should be No existe la informaci贸n solicitada.
response body path $.id should be 5001
response body path $.descripcion[0] should be

elements.name: Obtener la informaci贸n del cliente pero validando cuando ingresamos mal los datos de consulta /clientes/versionApi

steps.name: I GET `host`/clientes/`versionApi`?idCliente=2000
response code should be 500
response body should be valid json
response body path $.codigo should be 500.api-clientes.1200
response body path $.mensaje should be Error al realizar la operaci贸n.
response body path $.informacion should be Ocurrio un error inesperado, intentar nuevamente
response body path $.tracking should be 22920181120162829642

elements.name: Creacion de un cliente de banco poder /clientes/versionApi

steps.name: I set Content-Type header to application/json

I set body to {"nombre": "Yaridel","apellidoPaterno": "Arzate","apellidoMaterno": "Landa","edad": "25","rfc":"CUPU800825569","email":"yaridel@gmail.com","direccion":"calle esperanza, num 10 de abril, Temixco Morelos","codigoPostal":"62588","referencias":"Frente a la base de camiones LOS PEPES","genero": "F"}
I POST to `host`/clientes/`versionApi`
response code should be 201
response body should be valid json
response body path $.mensaje should be El Cliente se ha creado exitosamente
response body path $.codigo should be 201
response body path $.detalles.id should be 1000
response body path $.detalles.nombre should be Yaridel
response body path $.detalles.apellidoPaterno should be Arzate
response body path $.detalles.apellidoMaterno should be Landa
response body path $.detalles.edad should be 25
response body path $.detalles.rfc should be CUPU800825569
response body path $.detalles.email should be yaridelal435@gmail.com
response body path $.detalles.direccion should be calle esperanza, 10 de abril, Temixco Morelos
response body path $.detalles.codigoPostal should be 62588
response body path $.detalles.referencias should be Frente a la base de camiones LOS PEPES
response body path $.detalles.genero should be F

elements.name: Validamos cuando ocurre un escenario no controlado /clientes/versionApi

I set body to {"nombre": "Jovani","apellidoPaterno": "Arzate", "apellidoMaterno": "Cabrera"}

response body should be valid json

steps.name: I set Content-Type header to application/json

I set body to {"nombre": "Yaridel","apellidoPaterno": "Arzate","apellidoMaterno": "Reyna","edad": "25","rfc":"CUPU800825569","email":"yaridel@gmail.com","direccion":"calle esperanza, num de abril, Temixco Morelos","codigoPostal":"62588","referencias":"Frente a la base de camiones LOS PEPES","genero": "F"}

response code should be 200
response body should be valid json
response body path $.mensaje should be Operacion exitosa
response body path $.codigo should be 200
response body path $.detalles.id should be 1000
response body path $.detalles.nombre should be Yaridel
response body path $.detalles.apellidoPaterno should be Arzate
response body path $.detalles.apellidoMaterno should be Reyna
response body path $.detalles.edad should be 25
response body path $.detalles.rfc should be CUPU800825569
response body path $.detalles.email should be yaridelal435@gmail.com

response body path $.detalles.codigoPostal should be 62588

response body path $.detalles.genero should be F

elements.name: Actualizar los datos de los clientes con escenario inesperado error interno /clientes/versionApi

steps.name: I set Content-Type header to application/json
I set body to {"nombre": "Yaridel","apellidoPaterno": "Arzate"}
I PUT `host`/clientes/`versionApi`
response code should be 500
response body should be valid json
response body path $.codigo should be 500.api-clientes.1200
response body path $.mensaje should be Error al realizar la operaci贸n.
response body path $.informacion should be Ocurrio un error inesperado, intentar nuevamente
response body path $.tracking should be 22920181120162829642
I DELETE `host`/clientes/`versionApi`?idCliente=3000
response code should be 200
response body should be valid json
response body path $.mensaje should be El Cliente se ha dado de baja exitosamente
response body path $.codigo should be 200
